group_1.narration: Hey... Since you're here...@Is it possible that you wanted to look back@on something too?
Oh, as for me...@Umm, I was just reminiscing a little bit@about the past.
Since I was able to change after meeting everybody,@I thought I'd take a look back@so I don't forget everything that has happened.
I've changed... but I'm still not quite there yet.

I think I've become a different person now@than I was back then, when I was someone@who was not good at fitting in with others,@always a little bit out of place at school,@and never stopped looking one step behind.
It must've been the various encounters I had@in my search for Ui that made me change.
It all started when I noticed a gaping hole in my heart...
Back then, I was feeling a sense of loneliness;@as if I had lost something importantãƒ¼@as if there was something missing.
